title: Cartoon Network Is Scaring Up Quite the Halloween Lineup of Your Kids’ Favorite Shows in October!
text:
Cartoon Network is ready for Halloween and its October "Spook-tober" lineup is completely stacked with brand new, Halloween-themed episodes of your kids' favorite shows like Ben 10 and DC Super Hero Girls. There are even special crossover episodes of Teen Titans Go! featuring the gang from Scooby-Doo.

It's a can't-miss lineup, and we've got the whole thing right here. Keep reading to hear about all of the new episodes for October and to see when they air.

Boo! 18 Kid-Friendly Halloween Movies Your Family Can Stream on Netflix in 2019
